descriptions.en: Houndstone spends most of its time sleeping in graveyards. Among all the dog Pokémon, this one is most loyal to its master.
descriptions.es: Houndstone spends most of its time sleeping in graveyards. Among all the dog Pokémon, this one is most loyal to its master.
descriptions.ca: Houndstone passa la majoria del temps dormint en cementiris. Entre tots els Pokémon gos, aquest és el més lleial al seu amo.
